mutants.code:
def candyStore(candies, N, K):
    candies = sorted(candies)
    (i, j) = (0, N)
    mn = 1
    while i < j:
        mn += candies[i]
        j -= K
        i += 1
    (i, j) = (-1, N - 1)
    mx = 0
    while i < j:
        mx += candies[j]
        i += K
        j -= 1
    return [mn, mx]
